mapper.select:
SELECT tmtp.property_code FROM t_mkt_task_profile tmtp INNER JOIN t_mkt_task tmt ON tmt.mkt_task_id = tmtp.mkt_task_id AND tmt.valid = 1 AND tmtp.valid = 1
tmt.sys_brand_id=#{sysBrandId}
